webscript.shortname: GET SAML IdP public certificate (in PEM format)
webscript.description:
http://<host>:<port>/alfresco/a/{network}/saml/{sp}/idp/pubcert
Example response from this web script:
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE----- .....base 64 encoding goes here..... -----END CERTIFICATE-----
Notes: - user must be a NetworkAdmin for given network/tenant
